com.nimsoft.nimbus.ci
Class ConfigurationItem

java.lang.Object
  com.nimsoft.nimbus.ci.ConfigurationItem

public final class ConfigurationItem
extends Object

Roughly, a "thing that is monitored".

More specifically, a Configuration Item (CI) is an entity, associated with a device, that has measurable attributes.

For example, a disk on a computer system is a CI. Its measurable attributes include space used, i/o operations, etc.

An application running on a system is also considered to be a CI.

A CI must have a path (also known as "type"), which is a dotted-decimal path such as "1.1". The path / type should be taken from a list available from CiManager.

A CI may also (optionally) have a name, which is a free-form string and can be something like "C:" (for a disk name) or "eth0" (for a network device name.) This device name is used to determine the "uniqueness" of a given CI, if some distinction should be made between CIs based on that name (as is appropriate for a disk or network device.)

A CI's unique identifier (@see getMD5()) consists of the device being monitored, the path, and the name.

Things get a bit more complicated when a remote system is involved. In that case, the device's unique identifier incorporates the remote system's IP address and the local (robot) system device identifier.

See Also:
RemoteDevice

Constructor Detail

ConfigurationItem

public ConfigurationItem(String ciPath,
                         String configurationItemName,
                         String monitoredHostName)
                  throws NimException,
                         IOException
Create a ConfigurationItem for a remote device. Saves information about the created ConfigurationItem as a PDS string representation to a file

Parameters:
ciPath - the path string of the Configuration Item, for example "2.2.1"
configurationItemName - the name of the item, for example "ping"
monitoredHostName - DNS name of the endpoint being monitored, for example "www.nimsoft.com"
Throws:
IOException
NimException

ConfigurationItem

public ConfigurationItem(String ciPath,
                         String configurationItemName,
                         String monitoredHostName,
                         String ipAddress)
                  throws NimException,
                         IOException
Create a ConfigurationItem for a remote device. Explicitly specify the hostname and ip address. Saves information about the created ConfigurationItem as a PDS string representation to a file

Parameters:
ciPath - the path string of the Configuration Item, for example "2.2.1"
configurationItemName - the name of the item, for example "ping"
monitoredHostName - DNS name of the endpoint being monitored, for example "www.nimsoft.com"
ipAddress - address of the endpoint being monitored
Throws:
IOException
NimException
